bottom line.translation[0].definitions[0: the profit or the amount of money that a business makes or loses
bottom line.translation[0].definitions[1: the least amount of money that you are willing to accept in a business deal
bottom line.translation[1].definitions[0: the figure showing a company’s total profit or loss
The company’s bottom line showed a net profit of 173 million euros.
Cost-cutting moves under way at the banks should help bottom lines.
bottom line.translation[1].definitions[1: the end result of something or the most important point about something
Accounting doesn’t change how much money you bring in; the bottom line is that their movies didn’t do well.
